item.title: Zelenskyy to meet Trump in Florida for talks on Ukraine peace plan
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and U.S. President Donald Trump will meet in Florida on Sunday to try to forge a plan to end the war in Ukrain...

item.title: Russian drones, missiles pound Ukraine ahead of Trump-Zelenskyy meeting
item.description: The latest strikes came less than 48 hours after Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy signaled that a peace deal was close.

item.title: The 'Trump-class' battleship faces a large obstacle in its way: Reality
item.description: Even if it were technically feasible, the cost of building the battleship would be prohibitive.

item.title: DOJ says more than 1 million potential Epstein files newly uncovered
item.description: A bipartisan group of Senators on Wednesday said the Trump administration violated the law by failing to release the records in full last week.

item.title: Supreme Court rejects Trump's bid to send National Guard to Chicago
item.description: In an unsigned decision released on Tuesday, the court said Trump lacked the authority to federalize troops in Chicago.
